1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Samantha Brown: Passport to Latin America (TV Series 2007–2008)

1.plot: Samantha Brown takes off for a tiny South American country that's often overlooked as a travel destination: Uruguay. It's a place where cows out number people three-to-one, where locals sip a mysterious beverage from gourd-like cups.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Samantha Brown: Passport to Latin America (TV Series 2007–2008)

5.plot: Samantha Brown travels to the most southern point of South America. She hangs with some penguins, meets a few of the last indigenous people in the world, steps into the kitchen to prepare a local treat - cooked beaver - and flies over Cape Horn.

locations: Punta Arenas, Magallanes, Región de Magallanes y de la Antártica Chilena, Chile
imdb.plot outline: Hola, Samantha! Travel expert Samantha Brown is back and headed south of the border to experience the passion, color and diversity of Latin America. During her adventures, Samantha offers practical tips and introduces local experts who will share the best their city has to Americans traveling abroad. From the bustle of Mexico City, to the intimacy of the tango in Buenos Aires, to the mystic mountain wonder of Machu Picchu, join Samantha as she takes full advantage of her Passport to Latin America.
imdb.title: Samantha Brown: Passport to Latin America
akas: Samantha Brown: Passport to Latin America (United States)
plot: Hola, Samantha! Travel expert Samantha Brown is back and headed south of the border to experience the passion, color and diversity of Latin America. During her adventures, Samantha offers practical tips and introduces local experts who will share the best their city has to Americans traveling abroad. From the bustle of Mexico City, to the intimacy of the tango in Buenos Aires, to the mystic mountain wonder of Machu Picchu, join Samantha as she takes full advantage of her Passport to Latin America.
